Reviews.Title: Smart watch
Reviews.Author: Robert Avery
Reviews.Content: Takes some time to get it to work. Fingers to big to work buttons. Need a stylus for easy use.

ProductInfo.Features:
Smart Bluetooth connects to Iphone and Android phones, enables to answer and dial calls.
Connecting to your mobile phone through bluetooth
Sync calling with your cellphone, directly call from this watch
Avoid loss with the proximity alert
Also works as an unlocked phone so you can insert a sim card and make calls or send texts directly from your watch without the need for a regular phone.
ProductInfo.Name: Smart Watch iPhone Android Phones Bluetooth Calling SMS Original by TechX (Blue)
